meanings.definition: A plant that produces fruit only once and then dies.
meanings.sent1: The monocarp in our garden bloomed beautifully before withering away.
meanings.sent2: The farmer was excited to see the monocarp finally bear fruit after years of waiting.
meanings.sent3: The monocarp decided to throw a big party before its final fruiting season.
meanings.sent4: The monocarp's single act of bearing fruit was like a grand finale before its exit from the stage of life.
meanings.sent5: The image of the monocarp's fleeting fruiting process stayed etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A plant that bears fruit only once in its lifetime.
meanings.sent1: We were amazed by the rare monocarp that grew in the forest and bore fruit just once.
meanings.sent2: The ancient legend spoke of a magical monocarp that granted a single wish when its fruit ripened.
meanings.sent3: The monocarp's fruit was so delicious that animals from all around came to taste it.
meanings.sent4: The monocarp's solitary fruiting event was like a once-in-a-lifetime celebration in the plant world.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the monocarp's fruit was a fleeting moment of beauty in the forest.
